title: 2 BHK Apartment in Panvel - Godrej City
description: Well-lit 2 BHK with modern finishes, close to local schools and market. Gated community with clubhouse and security. Ideal for families and professionals.

title: 3 BHK Tower View - New Launch
description: Spacious 3 BHK with tower views, premium amenities including pool and gym. Excellent connectivity to transit and business hubs.

title: Luxury 4 BHK Villa
description: Premium 4 BHK villa with private garden, luxury fittings and multiple terraces. Excellent for large families seeking privacy and space.

title: Commercial Plot - Near Highway
description: Strategically located commercial plot with excellent highway access—suitable for warehouses, showrooms, or retail development.

title: 2 BHK Resale - Ready to Move
description: Comfortable 2 BHK resale apartment, fully furnished, well-maintained. Low maintenance charges and immediate possession available.

title: 1 BHK Starter Home
description: Compact and affordable 1 BHK perfect for first-time buyers or rental investment. Good connectivity and local amenities nearby.
